author: Pepper
title: WONDERFULL!!
review:
I don't even remember when I got this set but here are some pros. and cons.,

Pros.
nice, sturdy design
nice figure

Cons.
none that I can think of

Over all this is a nice set that you should get, if you can find it.

author: Legoluvr
title: AWSOME for a little set
review:
I love this little set!
This is the second promo set i got in the summer of 2002.
During that time, I LOVED the little shell sets.
Well, here are the pros and cons.


PROS

very sturdy
cool shell mini fig

CONS
STICKERS
nothing else

author: BuilderBrothers
title: Little Shell Set
review: Not much to this set.  Basically, all this is is a shell minifigure and a mini car.  Pretty much the only real good thing about it is the torso of the minifgure.  Sorry to rate this set so low, but it is really not that good unless you want a few extra parts with the torso.

author: Cult_Of_Skaro
title: 1251 Go-Cart
review:
Please ignore my VFM rating, as I got this for free from a friend. On to the set. The box is nothing to write home about, just a standard oversized LEGO box. The car itself is rather ugly and blocky, which isn't overly surprising, seeing as this was a Shell promo. The only good part is really the minifigure. I was very please to get a branded minifig, as I think these kind of add a "real world" feeling to the LEGO world.

Price/Parts ratio: No comment.
Parts Selection: 1/10
Minifigs: 7/10
Construction: 0/10
Design: 0/10
Final Score: 1.6
